entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LoadExtension throws exception 'SQLite Error 1: 'error during initialization: ' #26220
  • Bug: Owned type configuration is dependent on registration order #26218

Closed

  • "dotnet ef dbcontext scaffold" can't find connection string (NullReferenceException in NamedConnectionStringResolver) #26169
    6.0.0
  • How to setup a tsql code to be inserted in migration from OnModelCreating #26178
  • Update columns only for modified properties from disconnected entity. #26183
  • OOM Exception occur when foreign key constraint violet #26219
  • Scaffolding many-to-many does not initialize skip navigations #26206
    6.0.0
  • Idempotent migration script generates problematic temporal table alter statement #26166
    6.0.0
  • No result returned when using Include and there is an Owned Entity in the object graph #26157
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0] Discover join type FK properties using the same naming convention as when creating them #26221

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26191
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [6.0] Separate design time and runtime service for NamedConnectionStringResolver #26205
  • [6.0] RevEng: Initialize skip collection navigations in ctor #26212
  • [6.0] Fix to #26166 - Idempotent migration script generates problematic temporal table alter statement #26193
  • [6.0] InMemory: Expand owned navigation as optional always #26213
